title: Would it still be possible to start a tech company? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are all kinds of tech companies. There will continue to be new companies that enter the market and there will be older companies that will fail to adapt and wills struggle and eventually leave the market. The real question is what innovations can be brought to bear that will be of value in the marketplace that can be made at a reasonable price point? People who come up with those ideas are more likely to be the next up and comers than is HP or Apple likely to continue to lead the innovation in the market.
